metaDescription: 611Study refers to the schedule of starting school at 6 a.m. and finishing at 11 p.m., with the phrase "fall sick, end up in the ICU." This has become a widespread and often mandatory routine in many middle and high schools across China. Countless students suffer both physically and mentally under this system. Through this project, we aim to help Chinese students break free from this prison-like schedule and reclaim a healthy, happy childhood.

site.title: 611Study ICU
site.description: A modern Next.js application with i18n and theme support

form.title: Overtime School Registration Questionnaire
form.description: Please fill in the relevant information of the school completely to ensure that the registration information is accurate.
form.card: We attach great importance to your privacy and data security. All information you submit will be kept strictly confidential and will only be used for academic research and data analysis. It will never be disclosed to any third party. Thank you for your trust and support.

province.label: Province
province.description: Province where your school is located

schoolStartTime.label: School Start Time
schoolStartTime.description: For your regular school start time, click the clock button on the right for quick entry (AM = morning, PM = afternoon).

schoolEndTime.label: School End Time
schoolEndTime.description: Daily school time (including evening self-study), click the clock button on the right to quickly fill in (AM-morning/PM-afternoon)

monthlyHolidays.label: Monthly Holiday Days
monthlyHolidays.description: Number of holiday days per month

suicideCases.label: Student Suicide Cases in 2024
suicideCases.description: Cases of students under extreme pressure

studentComments.label: Student Comments
studentComments.description: Share your thoughts about mental health pressure at your school
